external_games.name: Fall of Jake Paul Hop World

name: Fall of Jake Paul Hop World
summary:
What is beat? I am glad you asked! This epic game is what you need to feel the power of song! Hop on tiles in the best beat of cool EDM songs. We recommend using headphones to feel that low bass.
Feel yourself nodding your head in rhythm with song. Game is simple, drag and hold to control the ball. Jump on each stunning tile and don't fall down! Cool backgrounds will change as you reach the end of track then it will loop and get quicker!
The fun will never end because this game is endless. See how far you can hop on tiles and share this game with your friends and family! Have epic time!

This is a fan made awesome game!
